lead_paragraph: The performance artist Monstah Black and his D.J. husband Manchildblack take T out for home décor shopping, Senegalese food and more.

headline.print_headline: On the Town; A Bed-Stuy Tour
headline.main: A Day in Bed-Stuy With Its Favorite Creative Couple

snippet: The performance artist Monstah Black and his D.J. husband Manchildblack take T out for home décor shopping, Senegalese food and more....
abstract: Choreographer and performance artist Monstah Black, who is starring in solo show Hyperbolic! (The Last Spectacle) at Dixon Place theater, gives tour of his favorite haunts around Bedford-Stuyvesant neighborhood in Brooklyn.
